attributes.action: Give our Families the truth behind Gulf War Syndrome and give the ill veterans the right healthcare treatment and support they so rightly deserve.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want the Prime minister to look again into the illnesses gulf war veterans suffer from and to give us the families answers as to what has happened to our loved ones. Please sign this petition and help thousands of veterans and families get to the truth and get much needed Healthcare and support they so rightly deserve
